entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nanisivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
